ComicInfo.Summary: On the moon, a robot speaks with an Utrom as the Utroms build a base on the moon. On Earth, the turtles are fighting of the Madhattan Maulitia. The turtles decided to move up to the rooftops to avoid the Maulitia, but we're surprised to find them there with snowmobiles. After giving the Maulitia a beating, our heroes steal a few snowmoblies and head home. Michelangelo gets left behind and accidental gets hit by the bus he tries to flag down, but is helped by a mysterious figure. Donatello's snowmobile blows up due to poor maintenance and reveals a mysterious truck.Elsewhere, Casey and April Jones, now married, head to the doctor to get information on their baby. In Northhampton, Shadow trains with Master Splinter and Metalhead while waiting to hear the results.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 14:05:57. [Issue ID 305301]
